mapper.sql: ID, IP, IS_BANNED, BANNED_TIME, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BLACK_IP where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into BLACK_IP
ID,
IP,
IS_BANNED,

DESCRIPTION,
CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update BLACK_IP
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_BANNED = #{isBanned,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANNED_TIME = #{bannedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update BLACK_IP set IP = #{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_BANNED = #{isBanned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANNED_TIME = #{bannedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
